snippet.title: Ni no Kuni II – The Tale of a Timeless Tome DLC Trailer | PS4, PC
snippet.description:
Prepare to face the Nightmares, encounter a legendary spell book, and enter the arena for the Solosseum Slog! 

"The Tale of a Timeless Tome" DLC comes to Ni no Kuni II on March 19th! Order #NiNoKuni2 today: https://bandainam.co/NinoKuniII

#NiNoKuni #BandaiNamco

Follow Bandai Namco Entertainment: 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcous/?hl=en
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BandaiNamcoUS/
Tumblr: http://bandainamcous.tumblr.com/
Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/bandainamcous
